an5.232:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato avasiko bhikkhu sabrahmacarinam piyo ca hoti manapo ca garu ca bhavaniyo ca.
an5.232:1.3: Silava hoti, patimokkhasamvarasamvuto viharati acaragocarasampanno anumattesu vajjesu bhayadassavi, samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu;
an5.232:1.4: bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhamma adikalyana majjhekalyana pariyosanakalyana sattham sabyanjanam kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam abhivadanti, tatharupassa dhamma bahussuta honti dhata vacasa paricita manasanupekkhita ditthiya suppatividdha;
an5.232:1.5: kalyanavaco hoti kalyanavakkarano poriya vacaya samannagato vissatthaya anelagalaya atthassa vinnapaniya;
an5.232:1.6: catunnam jhananam abhicetasikanam ditthadhammasukhaviharanam nikamalabhi hoti akicchalabhi akasiralabhi;
an5.232:1.7: asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati.
an5.232:1.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato avasiko bhikkhu sabrahmacarinam piyo ca hoti manapo ca garu ca bhavaniyo ca”ti.
